body:
Well you know what to do :P 
(Limit of 5 questions per person)

Answers:
Are you a fish? - Nope ;)
What is your favorite game Other  then Minecraft? Hmm, Monopoly
Favourite game? Minecraft
Favourite hobby? I dont know :/ 
Will you marry me? no...
Do you even lift, bro? Umm no, im not a bro :P
Why your skin so pwettty? Cuz its bootiful like Summer 
Do you believe in Herobrine? Nope
Do you have a boyfriend? No
What's your favorite subject in school? Math
If you could morph into an animal and morph back to a human any time you wanted, what animal would you be and why? I'd be a tiger so I could run through the Jungle :P
Do you prefer light or dark colors and why? Dark colors, i dont know :P
Would you rather receive $5,000 for yourself or give some random, decently poor person $2,500? hmm this is a hard one, i think i'd have to take the 5k but then give 2.5k away :D win-win
Would you rather have to hurt a friend or have to hurt a random stranger that you'd have to be around for the rest of your life? Um wow, I'm not sure about this one o_O
Would you rather never be able to touch someone or never be able to touch a computer (and it's accessories (mouse, keyboard, et cetera)) ever again? never be able to touch a computer
What do you like to do outside of Minecraft? swimming, hair, board/card games
Can we be friends?  of course! :D
You wanna build a snowman? yes but i have no snow :(
favorite flavour of youtube? strawberry
Origin of your username? well its fishy face as in like duck face but a fish face, and then diamond because i knew at the time that diamonds were like the best thing in minecraft so fishyfacediamond!
Do you play any other games besides MC? yes, board games, card games, and racing car games
Are you good at school? i would say so, yes
Do you play sports? nope
What do you like about this server? i love the minigames and the community
